00013 #ifndef POLYHEDRON_H
00014 #define POLYHEDRON_H
00015 
00016 #include <gtl/gtl.hpp>
00017 #include <gtl/vec3.hpp>
00018 #include <gtl/ray.hpp>
00019 #include <gtl/matrix3.hpp>
00020 
00021 namespace gtl
00022 {
00023 #define MIN_VERTICES 4  // minimum number of vertices required to have a polyhedron
00024 
00030     template<typename Type>
00031     class Polyhedron
00032     {
00033     public:
00035         Polyhedron()
00036         {
00037                         Vec3<Type> pts[4];
00038 
00039                         m_vertices = NULL;
00040                         m_num_vertices = 0;
00041 
00042                         pts[0].setValue(-1, -1, 0);
00043                         pts[1].setValue(1, -1, 0);
00044                         pts[2].setValue(0, 1, 0);
00045                         pts[3].setValue(0, 0, 1);
00046 
00047                         setVertices(pts, 4);
00048         }
00049 
00051         Polyhedron(const Vec3<Type> *pts, int num_points)
00052         {
00053                         m_vertices = NULL;
00054                         m_num_vertices = 0;
00055 
00056             if (setVertices(pts, num_points) < 0)
00057                                 Polyhedron();   // if setVertices fails, construct default polyhedron...
00058         }
00059 
00061         virtual ~Polyhedron()
00062                 {
00063                         if (m_vertices != NULL)
00064                                 delete [] m_vertices;
00065                 }
00066 
00068                 int getNumVertices()
00069                 {
00070                         return m_num_vertices;
00071                 }
00072 
00074         int setVertices(const Vec3<Type> *pts, int num_points)
00075         {
00076                         if (num_points < MIN_VERTICES)
00077                                 return -1;
00078 
00079                         if (m_vertices != NULL)
00080                                 delete [] m_vertices;
00081 
00082                         m_vertices = new Vec3<Type> [num_points];
00083                         m_num_vertices = num_points;
00084 
00085                         for (int i = 0; i < m_num_vertices; i++)
00086                         {
00087                                 m_vertices[i].setValue(pts[i].x(), pts[i].y(), pts[i].z());
00088                         }
00089 
00090                         return 0;
00091                 }
00092 
00094         void getVertex(int vertex_index, Vec3<Type> &vertex)
00095         {
00096                         if (vertex_index < 0 || vertex_index >= m_num_vertices)
00097                         {
00098                                 return;
00099                         }
00100 
00101                         vertex.setValue(m_vertices[vertex_index].x(), 
00102                                                         m_vertices[vertex_index].y(),
00103                                                         m_vertices[vertex_index].z());
00104                 }
00105 
00107                 void rotate(Vec3<Type> axis, Vec3<Type> point, double angle)
00108                 {
00109                         Type q[4];
00110 
00111                         // Calculate the rotation quaternion
00112                         q[0] = cos(angle / 2.0);
00113                         q[1] = sin(angle / 2.0) * axis.x();
00114                         q[2] = sin(angle / 2.0) * axis.y();
00115                         q[3] = sin(angle / 2.0) * axis.z();
00116 
00117                         // And now the rotation matrix
00118                         Matrix3<Type> matrix(SQR(q[0]) + SQR(q[1]) - SQR(q[2]) - SQR(q[3]),             2 * (q[1] * q[2] - q[0] * q[3]),                                2 * (q[1] * q[3] + q[0] * q[2]),
00119                                                                 2 * (q[2] * q[1] + q[0] * q[3]),                                        SQR(q[0]) - SQR(q[1]) + SQR(q[2]) - SQR(q[3]),  2 * (q[2] * q[3] - q[0] * q[1]),
00120                                                                 2 * (q[3] * q[1] - q[0] * q[2]),                                        2 * (q[3] * q[2] + q[0] * q[1]),                                SQR(q[0]) - SQR(q[1]) - SQR(q[2]) + SQR(q[3]));
00121 
00122                         // Perform the actual rotation on all vertices
00123                         for (int v = 0; v < m_num_vertices; v++)
00124                         {
00125                                 Vec3<Type> rotated;
00126 
00127                                 m_vertices[v] -= point; // translate to origin
00128                                 matrix.multMatrixVec(m_vertices[v], rotated);   // rotate around origin
00129                                 m_vertices[v] = rotated + point;        // translate back to initial point
00130                         }
00131                 }
00132 
00133     protected:
00134         Vec3<Type> *m_vertices;
00135                 int                     m_num_vertices;
00136     };
00137 
00138     typedef Polyhedron<int>    Polyhedroni;
00139     typedef Polyhedron<float>  Polyhedronf;
00140     typedef Polyhedron<double> Polyhedrond;
00141 } // namespace gtl
00142 
00143 #endif
